channel.title: Yes, i need help making a hamachi server up and running..u get co- if u help :)
channel.description: Yea, If someon could help me get a hamachi server up and running...i would appreciate it. Just email me in a few steps how to do it. Thanks :)

item.title: Yes, i need help making a hamachi server up and running..u get co- if u help :)
item.dc:creator: @twinke42 twinke42
item.description:
@twinke42 wrote:

Naw, i got a no-ip and stuff…but on tut, it says this:Once you downloaded it you can start editing the source.
The most things you need to edit are in client.java.
Open it and Press Ctrl + H.
In the first field fill in the source’s server name.
In the second field fill in the name of your server.
Now press replace all.

item.title: Yes, i need help making a hamachi server up and running..u get co- if u help :)
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Ok, heres a quick thing. Hamachi is like taking all of your valuables, and putting them on your driveway. Then, posting the server is like putting signs up to take your stuff. Hamachi will allow hackers to easily gain control of unprotected Windows based systems, because in the long run its just a virtual local area network.

So, forget Hamachi and just run a server, port forward, and your good. And besides, who looks at the Hamachi server list?

Read full topic
